ygData.subject: twinking Re: [EverQuest] money problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Nothing to do with real life , it is called twinking. More of an issue with some classes than others. LeSamLam@aol.com wrote: I m not a core roleplayer.  And
ygData.messageBody:
Nothing to do with "real life", it is called twinking. More of an issue with some classes than others.

  LeSamLam@... wrote:

I'm not a core roleplayer.  And it's still sad to me to see a lower level
with better stuff than me.  I'll get it one day so I'm not envious.  I just
hate to see it.

Lena

<< It isnt sad, its real life. These things happen every day, both in-game and
outside. If you are a core roleplayer just think of it as he had a rich
uncle. If not well, you would do it yourself if you had a chance. Simply
nothing to moan about.

Envy wont help you one bit. Most likely hes gone through the "i killed 2000
rats and then 2000 orc pawns" with another character and its not appealing
to do it again.

/Alex >>

-Jordan Argus
